name: hoplytics-agency-plus
description: High-performance WordPress theme for marketing agencies.

scripts.lint: npm run lint:css && npm run lint:js
scripts.i18n:pot: npx @wordpress/create-block --no-plugin --variant static --namespace hoplytics || wp i18n make-pot . languages/hoplytics.pot --domain=hoplytics --exclude=node_modules,dist,_archive,vendor
scripts.zip: npm run build && cd .. && zip -r hoplytics-agency-plus.zip hoplytics-agency-plus -x 'hoplytics-agency-plus/node_modules/*' 'hoplytics-agency-plus/_archive/*' 'hoplytics-agency-plus/.git/*'
